nl.vrom.roo.validator.core

Class ValidatorContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.vrom.roo.validator.core.TaskContext
      • nl.vrom.roo.validator.core.ValidatorContext

  • public class ValidatorContext
extends TaskContext
    This class is contains the validator context information of the several validations executed by the validator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class nl.vrom.roo.validator.core.TaskContext

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful()
        Determine if all the validations executed where successful. This means that there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.FATAL and no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.ERROR.
        Returns:
        true if all the validations in this context where successful

      • isCompletelySuccessful

        public boolean isCompletelySuccessful()
        Determine if all the validations executed where completely successful. This means that the context isSuccessful() and there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.WARNING.
        Returns:
        true if all the validations in this context where completely successful

      • isCompletelySuccessful

        public boolean isCompletelySuccessful(java.lang.String validationName)
        Determine if the validation executed is completely successful for the validationName. This means that the context isSuccessful() and there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.WARNING for the specified validationName.
        Parameters:
        validationName - name of the validation
        Returns:
        true if the validation in this context is completely successful for the validation name

      • isCompletelySuccessful

        public boolean isCompletelySuccessful(AbstractValidation validation)
        Determine if the validation executed is completely successful for the validation. This means that the context isSuccessful() and there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.WARNING for the specified validation.
        Parameters:
        validation - the validation
        Returns:
        true if the validation in this context is completely successful for the validation name

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful(java.lang.String validationName)
        Determine if all the validations executed where successful for the validationName. This means that there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.FATAL and no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.ERROR for the specified validationName.
        Parameters:
        validationName - name of the validation
        Returns:
        true if all the validations in this context where successful

      • isSuccessful

        public boolean isSuccessful(AbstractValidation validation)
        Determine if all the validations executed where successful for the validation. This means that there are no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.FATAL and no messages of type ValidatorMessageType.ERROR for the specified validation.
        Parameters:
        validation - the validation
        Returns:
        true if all the validations in this context where successful
